name: APIMorph
tagline: A Polymorphic API for rapid front-end prototyping or API mocking
body:
# Why ?
Lately, AngularJS became a major brick of my projects stack and I love the fact that I can use quick-and-dirty JSON to create my model. However, once the first prototype was done, I had to implement an API that usually was only a CRUD API with some findBy features.

Tired of that situation, I took advantage of a private hackathon organized by some folks at [Lateal Throughts](http://www.lateral-thoughts.com/) to start the project.

This is our (@obigroup and @MaximeGaudin) output...

# Features
## A Full Featured CRUD API
Our first feature was to implement a full feature (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH) REST (and HATEOAS) API.
